narrative.iWantTo: use the widget configurator to customize the layout of the widget, and have ability to grab a small code snippet to insert into 3-rd party websites

scenario.title: (/products-and-docs/widgets/calendar/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that required fields are not empty
scenario.step: Then the required fields are not empty on the Calendar Widget page

scenario.title: (/products-and-docs/widgets/calendar/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that embed code functionality works properly
scenario.step: Then the pop-up Embedded Code is opened
And embedded html code contains stored values of: apiKey,keyword,zipCode,radius

scenario.title: (/products-and-docs/widgets/calendar/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that Country field is changed accordingly Zip Code

examples.step: When change value of Zip Code <zipCode>
Then the Country field contains appropriate value <countryName>
When change value of Zip Code 01000
Then the Country field contains appropriate value France
When change value of Zip Code K1P 1J1
Then the Country field contains appropriate value Canada

scenario.title: (/products-and-docs/widgets/calendar/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check RESET button functionality
scenario.step: Then values of fields: apiKey,keyword,zipCode,radius equals stored values

scenario.title: (/products-and-docs/widgets/calendar/) Check RESET button functionality on Embedded Code Pop-up window
scenario.step: When click reset button on Calendar Widget Page
Then the pop-up Embedded Code is opened
And embedded html code contains stored values of: apiKey,keyword,zipCode,radius

scenario.title: (/products-and-docs/widgets/calendar/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check links
scenario.step: When I click on the 'Get your own' link to get api key
Then The page is opened with url https://developer-acct.ticketmaster.com

scenario.title: (/products-and-docs/widgets/calendar/) Event message - Check event message for invalid API Key
scenario.step: Then the event message is shown "No results were found"
